name: Fragile Bounds
description:
Rumors speak of an entity that destroys reality with one flick that is being studied.

But nevermind that, enjoy your stay on the deluxe cruise! 

--Controls--
W,A,S,D for movement
Mouse to aim, Left click to interact

Made in 72 hours for the Minijam 108. Enjoy this top down adventure exploring the fragile bounds of this world. Created by Tigran Bleyan with m3x6 font by Daniel Linssen.

--Settings--
This game features a timer that counts down to failure. To disable or change the timer, go to settings and edit the timer. I have placed the timer to add suspense and tension to the gameplay but the power for change is in your hands. You can also change the volume of music and volume but I highly recommend to play with volume!

Follow me on Twitter, Youtube or Itch for more. I will definitely share more about making this game. Thanks for playing my second jam game! Feel free to message, let's have a conversation!
